#summary HoudahAppServer: framework overview.

= HoudahAppServer =

The HoudahAppServer framework acts as an extension to Appleâ€™s WebObjects/AppServer framework. As such it depends on the HoudahFoundation framework.

HoudahAppServer provides means for handling [ClientSideBacktracking  client-side backtracking] and implementing [ServerSideBacktracking server-side backtracking].

HoudahAppServer has facilities for loading JavaScript and CSS into WebObjects pages in both development and deployment environments.
